Detailed Description

NMF component description ABI.

The NMF component description ABI is stored in the nmf_segment in the ELF component file. The NMF component description section start by the t_elf_component_header structure.

Warning:
The format of this section is not fixed and is able to be changed without concerting.
Note:
You can use the nmfHeaderVersion to check if the format has changed.
Each pointers in this section is relative to the beginning of the section and must be relocated before used.

Enumeration Type Documentation

enum t_elf_interface_provide_type

Description of provided interface type (value could be combinated).

Enumerator:
COLLECTION_PROVIDE 

Provided interface is a collection.

VIRTUAL_PROVIDE 

Provided interface is virtual (only for introspection purpose).

enum t_elf_interface_require_type

Description of required interface type (value could be combinated).

Enumerator:
COLLECTION_REQUIRE 

Required interface is a collection.

OPTIONAL_REQUIRE 

Required interface if optional.

STATIC_REQUIRE 

Required interface is static.

VIRTUAL_REQUIRE 

Required interface is virtual (only for introspection purpose).

INTRINSEC_REQUIRE 

Required interface is intrinsec (bind automatically done by runtime).
